commit.message:
loop.c (loop_optimize): Fix value max_uid_for_loop is reset to after find_and_verify_loops call.

	* loop.c (loop_optimize): Fix value max_uid_for_loop is reset
	to after find_and_verify_loops call.

From-SVN: r24973
